div.bibl: Restaurant Keepers' Guide, 108 N. Dearborn Street, Chicago, Illinois, June, 1925. RETAIL FRUIT MERCHANTS' ASSOCIATION OF CHICAGO

body.p: We are glad to announce that the fruit dealers, American citizens of Greek origin, in a well-attended meeting on the 24th of last month organized an association under the name of Retail Fruit Merchants Association of Chicago and elected the following officers:
C. Raptis, Geo. Coliopoulos, Wm. Chialtas, Jas. Kapsias, Wm. Tarantelis and C. Theodoropoulos, directors.
Our best wishes for their progress and success.
